scripts.deploy-ammv2: pnpm --filter common run get-chain-config-prod && pnpm --filter amm-v2 run set-config && pnpm --filter amm-v2 run codegen && pnpm --filter amm-v2 run build && pnpm --filter amm-v2 run deploy
scripts.deploy-ammv3: pnpm --filter common run get-chain-config-prod && pnpm --filter amm-v3 run set-config && pnpm --filter amm-v3 run codegen && pnpm --filter amm-v3 run build && pnpm --filter amm-v3 run deploy
scripts.deploy-blocks: pnpm --filter common run get-chain-config-prod && pnpm --filter blocks run set-config && pnpm --filter blocks run codegen && pnpm --filter blocks run build && pnpm --filter blocks run deploy
scripts.deploy-incentives: pnpm --filter common run get-chain-config-prod && pnpm --filter incentives run set-config && pnpm --filter incentives run codegen && pnpm --filter incentives run build && pnpm --filter incentives run deploy
scripts.deploy-all: pnpm --filter common run get-chain-config-prod && ts-node-esm -P tsconfig.node.json deployAll.ts
